description: Erection of hip-to-gable roof extension and rear dormer extension with juliet balcony and installation of 3x rooflights to front roof slope to facilitate a loft conversion.
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) (or any Order revoking and reenacting that Order with or without modification), no windows shall be inserted nor any other openings formed (other than those expressly authorised by this permission) at first floor level or above in the in the north-western (flank) elevation of the dwelling unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Condition 3 (Construction Logistics Plan) - The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition 3 of planning permission 19/01218/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please confirm the description ''Demolition of existing detached garage, erection of new two storey 3 bed dwelling with accommodation on roof space. Erection of single storey rear and roof extension with rear dormer to facilitate loft conversion in existing house.''
